articles.author: JESSICA DONATI, SAM MEDNICK
articles.title: US military operations across the Sahel are at risk after Niger ends cooperation - The Associated Press
articles.description: The U.S. is scrambling to assess the future of its counterterrorism operations in the Sahel region of Africa after the ruling junta in Niger announced it was ending military cooperation with Washington. The U.S. military has hundreds of troops stationed at a …
articles.content: DAKAR, Senegal (AP) The United States scrambled on Sunday to assess the future of its counterterrorism operations in the Sahel after Nigers junta said it was ending its yearslong military cooperation… [+4440 chars]
